She was best known for having rescued The Diary of Anne Frank from the reject pile. Jones also helped publish Julia Child's Mastering the Art of French Cooking.Raising Steaks, Christine Muhlke, NY Times September 24, 2009 Jones retired as senior editor and vice president at Alfred A. Knopf in 2011. Jones was also a cookbook author and memoirist.
